title.native: マーメイドメロディー ぴちぴちピッチ

description: As the mermaid princess of the North Pacific (one of the seven mermaid kingdoms), Lucia entrusts a magical pearl to a boy who falls overboard a ship one night. Lucia must travel to the human world to reclaim her pearl and protect the mermaid kingdoms. Using the power of music Lucia is able to protect herself and the mermaid kingdoms from a growing evil force.

tags.name: Musical Theater
tags.description: Features a performance that combines songs, spoken dialogue, acting, and dance.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Mermaid
tags.description: A mythological creature with the body of a human and the tail of a fish.

tags.name: Urban Fantasy
tags.description: Set in a world similar to the real world, but with the existence of magic or other supernatural elements.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Suicide
tags.description: The act or an instance of taking or attempting to take one's own life voluntarily and intentionally.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Surfing
tags.description: Centers around surfing as a sport.

tags.name: Swimming
tags.description: Centers around the sport of swimming.

tags.name: Coastal
tags.description: Story prominently takes place near the beach or around a coastal area/town. Setting is near the ocean.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Primarily Child Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of characters below a high school age.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

alternative: シスター シェシェ (Sister Sheshe)

node.description:
__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Twitter](http://twitter.com/uedakana) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/uedakana69/)

__Non-anime roles:__
• Yoimiya - Genshin Impact (VG)
• Hera - Aether Gazer (VG)
• Fu Ji - Mahjong Soul (VG)
• Cermia - Epic 7 (VG)
• Melania - Reverse: 1999 (VG)
• Carlotta - Wuthering Waves (VG)

Christopher Owen Ayres was an American voice actor, ADR director and scriptwriter who worked on a number of Japanese anime series at Seraphim Digital/Sentai Filmworks, Funimation, OkraTron 5000 and New Generation Pictures. He got his start voice acting at ADV Films on Kino's Journey as an extra. In anime, he was known as the voice of Frieza from Dragon Ball Z Kai, Kei Kurono from Gantz, Prince Soma from Black Butler, and Shingen Takeda from the Sengoku Basara series. He is also known for Mock Combat for Cosplay panels at anime conventions.

(Source: Wikipedia)

Chris died on October 18, 2021 due to health complications. He had previously been treated for COPD/emphysema by receiving a double lung transplant.

Hobbies: dancing, play with cats, reading books.

She is a voice actress part of Office Osawa, previously affiliated with Production Baobab.

[Profile](http://osawa-inc.co.jp/blocks/index/talent00092.html) | [Anison](http://anison.info/data/person/10020.html) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mayumi_Asano) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E6%B5%85%E9%87%8E%E3%81%BE%E3%82%86%E3%81%BF)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/macamacam) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/asumi.nakada/?hl=ja)

Hobbies: listening to music, shopping  
Skills & Abilities: painting, piano

__Height:__ 150cm

[Profile](https://www.81produce.co.jp/actor_search/index.php/item?id=195) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nejimakiya521)

Announced her marriage to fellow voice actor [Takeharu Onishi](https://anilist.co/staff/95751/) on March 3, 2021.
**Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).

Hanamori entered Nakayoshi's New Faces contest in 2000 with her manga MISS DIETER HEROINE. Her debut work 'Get Nude!' was in 2001's Nakayoshi Spring Breakland. Pichi Pichi Pitch is considered her signature work.

She is the youngest of 3 children and loves furry animals and dogs. She is a fan of Johnny's and Variety shows. She likes snacks and loves to sleep. She is a very energetic persona and loves to talk.

__Hobbies:__ Drawing, Poetry, Reading, Guitar
__Favorite Sports:__ Tennis, Long Distance Running

Miyuki passed away due to heart failure on June 18, 2008.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/奥田誠治_(アニメーション演出家%29)

Seiji Okuda is a veteran anime director. He established Project Team Eikyuukikan, a collaboration of several animators, which was disbanded by him in October 2009. He continues to work freelance, mostly as storyboarder. He is also a member of the JAniCA.

_Note: Not to be confused with the producer [Seiji Okuda](https://anilist.co/staff/219343/)._

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/高橋ナツコ)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/193091/)._
